item.title: Json in Golang
item.description: When you start a project which interacts with the outer world, it requires data exchange. To make a project successful this interaction must be simple and efficient. What is Data Exchange? Data exchange is the process of taking data structured under a source schema and transforming it into data structured under a target schema, so that the target data is an accurate representation of the source data. - Wikipedia
